tool_description: Analyzes woodworking project specifications to determine material requirements, structural needs, and aesthetic preferences for wood selection.

project_type.description: Type of project (furniture, flooring, cabinetry, outdoor, structural, decorative)

dimensions.description: Project dimensions in inches [length, width, height]

intended_use.description: Primary use case (indoor, outdoor, high-traffic, decorative, structural)

error_messages: Invalid project type: Use one of [furniture, flooring, cabinetry, outdoor, structural, decorative]
Invalid dimensions: Provide exactly 3 positive numbers for [length, width, height] in inches
Invalid intended use: Use one of [indoor, outdoor, high-traffic, decorative, structural]
Invalid finish type: Use one of [natural, stain, paint, clear_coat]
usage: Specify the project type, dimensions, and intended use to get material requirements. Optionally specify finish type for more targeted recommendations.

grain_preference.description: Recommended grain pattern (tight, medium, open, figured)

moisture_resistance.description: Required moisture resistance level (low, medium, high)
